categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The RS Revenge was a cruiser in the Rebel Alliance's fleet during their civil war against the Galactic Empire. At some point between 0 BBY and 1 ABY, it was captained by a man named Kazan and stationed at an Alliance base that was hidden in an asteroid field. When the Rebel-allied smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca left the base to retrieve a mystical artifact known as the Talisman, Kazan recorded a starlog journal entry about their mission from the RS Revenge's bridge. His entry, which mentioned the cruiser by name, was later used as narration for a cartoon created about the mission.

The RS Revenge's only mention in Star Wars canon is in The Story of the Faithful Wookiee, a cartoon written by George Lucas and produced by Nelvana Studios. It first aired on television as part of 1978's The Star Wars Holiday Special and was later included as an Easter egg on the 2011 Star Wars: The Complete Saga Blu-ray release. Captain Kazan and the RS Revenge were late additions to the cartoon; neither are mentioned in the fourth draft of the Holiday Special's script.
